name: Crunchy Pecan Cookies
author: thedailygourmet
summary: Pecan cookies are a change of pace from the traditional chocolate chip cookies. The pecan oil lends a depth of richness.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Combine butter, brown sugar, and sugar in a bowl and cream with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes
Add in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition
Add vanilla extract and pecan oil and beat until well combined
Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl
Add the flour mixture to the bowl in 3 additions
Use a small cookie scoop to drop portions of dough 3 inches apart on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Increase heat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and bake until edges turn golden, about 5 minutes more
Let cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to racks to cool completely
